alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 1:33PM PST until January 09 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 9 PM PST TUESDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph and waves 2 to 3 feet for Pyramid Lake. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 9 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
